amplify.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make sound louder, especially musical sound
amplify.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to increase the effects or strength of something
amplify.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: These stories only amplified her fears.
amplify.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to explain something that you have said by giving more information about it
amplify.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Would you care to amplify that remark?
